name: Elite Gourmet ECT4123 Long Slot 4 Slice Toaster, Extra Wide 1.5" and 5.1" Deep Slots, Bagel, Defrost & Cancel Functions, 6 Toast Shade Settings, Fits Bagels, Waffles, Artisan Breads, Stainless Steel
short_description: 2 EXTRA LARGE TOASTING SLOTS 1.5” wide, 10” long & 5.1” deep to fit up to 4 extra thick slices of specialty breads such as Texas Toast, Bagels and Artisan breads. ONE TOUCH BUTTONS WITH TRUE BAGEL, DEFROST & REHEAT FUNCTIONS allow you to easily toast, defrost or reheat bread quickly and conveniently. Enjoy delicious Bagels perfectly toasted on the inside while leaving the outside warm & soft. 6 ADJUSTABLE TOASTING LEVELS for the perfect browning shade for your bread, from slightly warm to dark and crunchy. REHEAT WARMING FUNCTION allows you to easily reheat and warm previously toasted bread quickly at a lower temperature without over toasting or burning. CONVENIENT CANCEL/EJECT BUTTON lets you quickly cancel and release the toast at any time during the toasting cycle.
product_description: Introducing the Elite Gourmet ECT4123 long slot stainless steel toaster with a beautifully sleek, elegant profile. Great for large families with a 4-slice capacity and uniquely designed toasting slots to accommodate extra wide, long and tall specialty breads & bagels. The one-touch, easy to use control panel & toasting level dial makes selecting your desired function and toast shades easy. There are 6 variable browning shades easy so you can select the perfect level of color & doneness for your toast, from light to dark. We’ve included a True bagel function to toast the inside of sliced bagels while keeping the outside warm and soft, a defrost function to quickly thaw & toast frozen slices of bread and a reheat function to quickly reheat toasted breads without overcooking or burning. The toaster will automatically count-down ensuring perfectly toasted bread every time. Say goodbye to burnt or underdone toast and hello to hassle-free toasting. Keep your countertop tidy & catch crumbs & debris with its’ easy to clean slide-out crumb tray. Enjoy convenient storage and a cord free counter by using the convenient cord wrap. Enjoy the convenience and ease of toasting and warming your favorite foods for breakfast, lunch, or a quick snack!

name: Elite Gourmet ECT-3100 Long Slot 4 Slice Toaster, Reheat, 6 Toast Settings, Defrost, Cancel Functions, Built-in Warming Rack, Extra Wide Slots for Bagels & Waffles, Stainless Steel & Black
short_description: EXTRA WIDE TOASTING SLOTS to fit extra thick slices of bread products such as Texas Toast, bagels and specialty breads. 6 ADJUSTABLE TOASTING LEVELS to select the perfect browning shade for your bread. From slightly warm to dark and crunchy. REHEAT WARMING FUNCTION allows you to easily reheat and warm previously toasted breads quickly at a lower temperature without burning. CONVENIENT CANCEL BUTTON lets you quickly cancel and release the toast in the middle of the toasting cycle. RETRACTABLE WARMING RACK for warming pastries, croissants, buns, rolls, pitas and more. DROP DOWN CRUMB TRAY & CORD STORAGE for quick and easy cleanup of crumbs and debris & no unsightly cords. TRUSTED BRAND - As a trusted brand for 40 years, Elite Gourmet has delivered high quality and stylish kitchen products that are affordable & user friendly. Call, email, or live chat with us, our US-based support team responds quickly to all inquiries.
product_description: The Stainless Steel Long Slot 4 Slice Toaster can toast a wide variety of your favorite breads. The large toasting slot can accommodate for longer, rectangular slices of bread such as sourdough or other artisanal loafs. It features 6 variable toast shade settings as well as Cancel, Defrost, and Reheat functions all encased in a sleek, modern, stainless steel housing. The extra long space saving design easily fits 4 slices of toast while not cluttering your countertop.

name: Toaster 4 Slice, Keenstar Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Dual Control Panels of Bagel/Defrost/Cancel Function, 7 Toasting Bread Shade Settings, Removable Crumb Trays, Auto Pop-Up, Stainless Steel
short_description: 【For Bagel & Most Breads】 : You can select from 7 different browning levels and choose from various types of bread. 4 wide (1.4'') slots with self-centering guides, perfect for different kinds of slices. Satisfies all your daily toasting needs.Warm Tips: We advise you to increase or reduce baking time for different kinds of breads accordingly. 【Dual Independent Control Panels】 With 4 slots and 2 independent control panels, You can adjust each side separately or use only one side at a time, allowing you to toast different bread types and use different functions simultaneously. It's perfect for families or individuals use, saving you time in the morning by providing a quick and efficient breakfast solution. 【Easy to Use 】 Our toaster features 3 practical functions: ①REHEAT option allows you to easily reheat and warm previously toasted breads quickly at a lower temperature without burning. ②DEFROST option thaws and toasts frozen bread perfectly. ③CANCEL button stops toasting anytime. 【Auto Shutoff & Easy to Clean 】: The toaster automatically shuts off at the end of the cycle, or if toast gets jammed. Give you peice of Mind. The built-in cord wrap in the base of the toaster makes it easy to neatly store the toaster when it's not being used. The removable crumb tray ensures effortless cleaning. 【Satisfaction Guaranteed】: Instruction manual included to ensure the recipient knows how to use it. We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee, free replacement within 1 year, and lifetime after-customer service from the date of purchase. So you can buy with confidence!

name: Elite Gourmet ECT4829B Long Slot 4 Slice Toaster, 6 Toast Settings Toaster Defrost, Reheat, Cancel Functions, Slide Out Crumb Tray, Extra Wide Slots for Bagels Waffles, Black
short_description: Space-Saving Long Slot Design – Along with toasting 4 slices of bread at once, the long shape saves counter space in the kitchen and blends in well with appliances. Quick Adjust Toaster Settings – This premium kitchen toaster features 6 variable toast shade settings to let you create light, medium, or crispy bread in minutes. Kitchen-Friendly Functions – We’ve added cancel, defrost, and reheat buttons to give you more control over your foods and to ensure toast or bread are just right. Slide-Out Crumb Tray – Cleaning up crumbs or mess after multiple uses is easy thanks to a simple slide out tray that lets you empty it out and wipe it down by hand. Self Centering Guides - The automatic self-centering guides easily centers the toast to allow even distribution of heat for perfect browning every time. Safety First - Toaster remains safely cool to the touch during use and non skid feet secure toaster in place TRUSTED BRAND - As a trusted brand for 40 years, Elite Gourmet has delivered high quality and stylish kitchen products that are affordable & user friendly. Call, email, or live chat with us, our US-based support team responds quickly to all inquiries.
product_description: Elite Gourmet Long Slot 4 Slice Toaster is a beautiful addition to any kitchen. Enjoy a wide variety of your favorite breads with the large toasting slots which can accommodate longer, rectangular slices of bread such as sourdough or other artisanal loafs. It features 6 variable toast shade settings as well as Cancel, Defrost, and Reheat functions all encased in a sleek, cool-touch housing. The extra-long space saving design easily fits 4 slices of toast while not cluttering your countertop.

name: Amazon Basics 4 Slice Toaster, 6 Browning Settings, Removable Crumb Tray, Bagel and Defrost Function, Cancel Button, 1600W, Black
short_description: 4-slot toaster for toasting bread, bagels, english muffins, and more Toasts quickly and evenly for perfect results each time 6 browning settings to choose from for your favorite level of toasting Multifunctional controls for bagels, defrost mode, and quick-cancel Removable crumb tray allows for quick, easy cleaning

name: BLACK+DECKER 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, 7 Shade Settings, 1400 Watts, Frozen and Bagel Buttons, Toast Shade Selector, Extra Lift
short_description: EXTRA-WIDE TOASTING SLOTS: Add a delicious crunch to bagels, thick breads, and more. The extra-wide slots accommodate all types of toasted treats. BAGEL FUNCTION: Put the perfect crisp on your morning bagel using the push-button bagel function. Also controls for frozen items and to end toasting. EXTRA LIFT: The lever lifts toast so it’s safely in reach. DROP-DOWN CRUMB TRAY: Keep the counter clean and the kitchen smelling fresh. The crumb tray lets you remove crumbs before they burn or mess up your kitchen. SHADE SELECTOR: Find the right shade for everyone’s tastes. The time selector knob ranges from 1-7.
product_description: Make breakfast for the whole family with the easy to use BLACK+DECKER 4-Slice Toaster. This black and silver toaster provides extra-wide slots with self-adjusting guides can handle thick bagels and artisan breads, and the high-lift lever puts everything easily in reach. Bagel and frozen options control the length of toasting for ideal results, and a cancel button lets you quickly pop toast. Plus, the drop-down crumb tray makes cleanup easy and the integrated cord wrap simplifies storage. Family breakfast time is more peaceful with the BLACK+DECKER 4-Slice Toaster .

name: BELLA 4 Slice Toaster with Auto Shut Off - Extra Wide Slots & Removable Crumb Tray and Cancel, Defrost & Reheat Function - Toast Bread & Bagel, Black
short_description: FAMILY-FRIENDLY: Elevate your breakfast game with BELLA's new beautiful toaster. Boasting 4 spacious slots, it can accommodate an array of breads, muffins, and bagels simultaneously, making it an ideal choice for hectic mornings with your loved ones TOAST THE WAY YOU LIKE IT: With temperature control and 6 different browning options, you can say goodbye to burnt bread and hello to perfectly toasted slices. The reheat function and cancel button make the portable toaster super easy to use and operate CLEAN WITH EASE: The high lift lever of the portable toaster provides easier access to smaller breads such as English muffins, and the removable crumb tray ensures mess-free cleanup. Safety features like auto shut off and anti-jam make your mornings worry-free NO MORE CLUTTER: Say goodbye to cluttered countertops with this 4 slot toaster, the greatest solution for a tidy and organized kitchen. Its slender profile and slick, versatile design make it easy to store, taking up minimal space on your countertop PERFECT FOR ANY OCCASION: The elegant matte finish and stainless steel accent give this bread toaster a modern look that will complement any decor. It's also a nice gift idea for birthdays and housewarmings and a great addition to your wedding registry
product_description: Looking for a quality 4 piece toaster that offers tons of benefits and features? Your search ends today. BELLA's small oven is exactly what you need. With temperature control, you can toast a variety of breads just the way you like them. It's also compact and small, making it easy to keep the countertop clean and the removable tray helps you get rid of the crumbs without any messes. Plus, this portable oven comes in several beautiful colors, so you can find the perfect one for your kitchen. And, if you need a double toaster for a large family or group, we offer a 4 slice option as well. This toaster is also safe to use, so you don't have to worry about burning your food. Whether you're a busy mom or dad looking for an easier breakfast solution or just want a nicer-looking kitchen appliance, this gorgeous powerhouse will have your back.

name: bella 4 Slice Slim Toaster, Fits-anywhereTM Kitchenware, 6 Setting Shade Control with Reheat & Cancel Buttons, Removable Crumb Tray, 10” Long Slot, Anti Jam & Auto Shutoff, 900 Watt, Oatmilk
short_description: Slim Design, Big Impact: With a sleek 6.14" profile, the bella 4-Slice Slim Toaster fits comfortably on any countertop without taking up much space. Part of our Fits-anywhere kitchenware collection, it’s the perfect blend of style and practicality Toasted Perfection: Six shade settings with a convenient cancel function allow you to customize your bread to your exact preference, from lightly golden to dark and crispy. Achieve your ideal toast with just a simple turn of the dial Easy Cleanup & Clutter-Free Countertop: The removable crumb tray slides out for quick cleaning, ensuring your smart toaster stays tidy and operates efficiently. Plus, the cord wrap feature keeps your countertop neat and free from tangled cords Effortless Access: Retrieving smaller slices like English muffins is a breeze with the high-lift lever, giving you easy access without burning your fingers. It’s thoughtful details like these that make this appliance a must-have for every kitchen
product_description: Introducing the bella 4-Slice Slim Toaster, where innovative design meets ultimate functionality. With a unique 10-inch long slot, this bagel toaster effortlessly accommodates two slices of square bread side by side or a variety of artisanal breads, bagels, baguettes, and thick Texas-style toast. The wide toasting space and slim 3.58" profile make it a perfect fit for any kitchen, combining versatility with space-saving efficiency. Control your toast exactly the way you like it with the 6-setting shade selector, plus Reheat and Cancel functions for precise browning. The high lift lever ensures easy access to smaller items like English muffins, while the auto-centering guides keep everything perfectly aligned for even toasting every time. Cleaning this toastie maker is a breeze with the removable slide-out crumb tray, and the anti-jam and auto shut off features provide added safety and peace of mind. Powered by a 900-watt toasting system, this toaster delivers quick and consistent results. Available in five stylish bella colors—Oatmilk, Surf, Plum, Seaglass, and Blossom—the long slot toaster is a modern, practical addition to any kitchen, offering both functionality and aesthetic appeal.

name: Cuisinart CPT-180BKS Classic 4-Slice Toaster, Black/Stainless Steel
short_description: MULTIPLE TOASTING FUNCTIONS: This Classic unit has versatile toasting functions such as Toast, Bagel, Defrost, Reheat and Cancel, ensuring your toasting needs are met CUSTOM SHADE CONTROL SETTINGS: 6-setting shade dial offers a full range of browning options to allow perfect customization of any piece of bread. Settings include light shade, medium shade and dark shade CLASSIC DESIGN: Includes 1.5-inch wide slots allowing for a wide variety of items to be toasted, High Lift Lever pops up when toast is finished and Dual Independent Toasting Controls which allows you to toast two different sets of toast at the same time CLEAN UP: Made easy with the removable crumb tray. It even has a cord wrap underneath LIMITED 3-YEAR WARRANTY: Refer to user manual for troubleshooting steps and questions surrounding warranty policies – this product is BPA free
product_description: The Cuisinart 4-Slice Metal Classic Toaster boasts beautiful brushed stainless steel housing with polished chrome and black accents. Not only does this toaster look sleek, but the results are as good as it looks, with custom controls to defrost and toast bread, pastries, and bagels four at a time for you and a friend. The dual control panels mean you can both enjoy your food just how you like it, toasted to the shade you love.

name: Mecity 4 Slice Toaster with Touch Screen Control, 4 Wide Slots, Stainless Steel Smart Bread Toaster for Bagels, Muffins, Waffles, Dual Control Panel, Timer, Defrost, Reheat, 120V 1650W
short_description: 【Sleek Touch Screen Control】: Featuring 2 large 4.4-inch touch screens, this smart toaster lets you easily select the perfect settings with just a tap. With intuitive icons and clear display, it brings high-tech sophistication to your kitchen while making toasting quick and convenient. 【Versatile for All Bread Types】: Whether you're toasting bagels, muffins, waffles, or any other bread type, the Mecity 4-slice toaster offers 6 browning levels and preset options for optimal results. With a single touch, enjoy perfectly toasted, crispy bread tailored to your preference. 【Consistent Even Toasting】: Designed with advanced heating technology, this toaster ensures even toasting for all bread types. After extensive testing and structural improvements, you can trust this toaster to consistently deliver deliciously golden, crispy slices every time. 【Dual Control Panels for Flexibility】: Featuring 2 separate control panels, this toaster allows you to toast different types of bread with individual browning settings on each side. Whether you prefer gluten-free bread, bagels, or any other style, you can toast multiple slices to perfection at the same time. 【Easy to Clean and Maintain】: The non-stick, food-grade stainless steel slots and removable crumb tray make cleaning this toaster a breeze. Spend less time maintaining your appliance and more time enjoying your perfectly toasted bread.
